PLATEAU Workshop
Bringing together Programming Languages and Human-Computer Interaction
Home Registration Program Prior Year Sites

PLATEAU2025
15th annual workshop on the intersection of HCI and PL
@ Northeastern University, Boston MA USA February 17-18, 2025
102 West Village H

PLATEAU 2025 Program

PLATEAU will take place on the Northeastern University campus in Boston, MA on February 17-18, 2025. Conference events will be held at West Village H in Room #102.

Day 1, February 17th
Title Time (EST)
Breakfast
9:00 AM–10:00 AM
Welcome and Intro
10:00 AM–10:15 AM
Interactivity and Animation
Bloom: Simplifying Interactive Diagram Development with Optimization Constraints,
Griffin Teller, Joshua Sunshine		10:15 AM–10:40 AM
Merlin: A Markup Language for Algorithm Animations,
Shu Wang, April Wang		10:40 AM–11:15 AM
Coffee Break
11:15 AM–11:45 AM
Visual Aids
Towards Better Formal Methods Visualizations,
Yiliang Liang, Avinash Palliyil, Eunsuk Kang, Joshua Sunshine		11:45 AM–12:20 PM
Code Style Sheets,
Sam Cohen, Ravi Chugh		12:20 PM–12:45 PM
Lunch
12:45 PM–2:00 PM
Notebooks
From Workbook to Notebook: Collaborative Data Story Authoring with Spreadsheet,
Zeyu Xiong, Behnood Masoudi, Catherine Schmit, April Wang		2:00 PM–2:30 PM
Exploring Support for Lightweight DSLs in Jupyter Notebooks,
Kevin Yang, Emma Tosch		2:30 PM–3:00 PM
Coffee Break
3:00 PM–3:30 PM
Education
Teachers Consideration of Trade-offs in Programming Education for Emergent Bilingual Students,
Emma R. Dodoo, Tamara Nelson-Fromm, Mark Guzdial		3:30 PM–4:05 PM
Questions Before Answers? A Comparison of Codebase Chatbots and Tutorials for Codebase Learning,
Shaokang Jiang, Jimmy Koppel, Michael Coblenz		4:05 PM–4:40 PM
Day 1 Wrap Up!
4:40 PM–5:00 PM
